segments.text: Hello , Ms . Barkley . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , thank you , sir . It ’ s nice to see you again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good to see you again , too . How ’ s you family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well , thank you , Mr . Parker .
segments.speaker: S2
